Message:
Right after I was born,
I got sick—with a sickness
called “becoming a witch.”

Day in and day out,
my mom and dad were
always apologizing to me.

“We’re so sorry, dear.
This happened because
we didn’t have enough Faith.”

“We’re going to find
a way to cure you, okay?”

I don’t quite get
all their grown-up talk.

Mom and Dad are so nice...
What did they do wrong?
Why is God mad at them?

I don’t quite get it all...
but I gotta do my best to
make my sickness go away.
Taking after my mom and dad,

every night before bed,
I prayed to the stars.

“Please make my
sickness go away,
so that Mom and Dad
can be happy again...”
